name: James Turrell Showcase
description: A meditative sequence inspired by Turrell's Skyspace, Roden Crater, and Ganzfeld works, demonstrating all effects and transitions.
narrative_intro: Welcome to the James Turrell Showcase. This show guides you through a meditative journey of color, light, and perception, inspired by Turrell's iconic works.

steps.narrative: The sky opens in a tranquil blue, inviting you to breathe and settle.
A gentle gradient flows, echoing the shifting light of dawn.
The space breathes with you, pulsing softly in pink.
A pulse of orange radiates, like the sun cresting the horizon.
A burst of white, shimmering and alive, disrupts the calm.
A playful chase of green closes the journey, returning you to stillness.
